items.name_english: Participant - Heroes of the Interstellar Armed Forces
items.name_schinese: 参与者 - 星际武装部队的英雄
items.before_description_english: Finished Season %season% in rank #%rank% with a score of %score%.
items.before_description_schinese: 以 %score% 分的成绩完成了第 %season% 赛季，排名第 %rank% 。
items.before_description_russian: Завершил %season%-й сезон на позиции #%rank% с результатом: %score%.
items.description_english: Medal awarded to those who participated in a season of Heroes of the Interstellar Armed Forces.
items.description_schinese: 勋章授予参与星际武装部队英雄赛季的玩家。
items.description_russian: Медаль, выдаваемая тем, кто участвовал в сезоне «Героев межзвёздных вооружённых сил».
items.after_description_english:
Aliens Killed: %alien_kills%
Team Kills: %player_kills%
Successful Missions: %games_won%
Failed Missions: %games_lost%
items.after_description_schinese:
击杀异形: %alien_kills%
击杀队友: %player_kills%
完成的任务: %games_won%
失败的任务: %games_lost%
items.after_description_russian:
Чужих убито: %alien_kills%
Союзников убито: %player_kills%
Миссий выполнено: %games_won%
Миссий провалено: %games_lost%

items.name_english: Elite - Heroes of the Interstellar Armed Forces
items.name_schinese: 精英 - 星际武装部队的英雄
items.before_description_english: Finished Season %season% in rank #%rank% with a score of %score%.
items.before_description_schinese: 以 %score% 分的成绩完成了第 %season% 赛季，排名第 %rank% 。
items.before_description_russian: Завершил %season%-й сезон на позиции #%rank% с результатом: %score%.
items.description_english: Medal awarded to those who finished a season of Heroes of the Interstellar Armed Forces in the top 100.
items.description_schinese: 勋章授予那些在星际武装部队英雄赛季中排名前 100 名的玩家。
items.description_russian: Медаль, выдаваемая тем, кто завершил сезон «Героев межзвёздных вооружённых сил» лучшим из 100 участников.
items.after_description_english:
Aliens Killed: %alien_kills%
Team Kills: %player_kills%
Successful Missions: %games_won%
Failed Missions: %games_lost%
items.after_description_schinese:
击杀异形: %alien_kills%
击杀队友: %player_kills%
完成的任务: %games_won%
失败的任务: %games_lost%

Союзников убито: %player_kills%

items.description_english: The trick is, this isn't a hat or a medal. It's a commemorative sticker.
items.description_schinese: 关键是，这不是一顶帽子或一枚勋章。这是一张纪念贴纸。
items.description_russian: Фокус в том, что это не шляпа и не медаль. Это памятная наклейка.
items.after_description_english: Complete the Ready For Duty achievement in Team Fortress 2 to unlock.
items.after_description_schinese: 在 Team Fortress 2 中完成 Ready For Duty 成就即可解锁。
items.after_description_russian: Получите достижение «К бою готов» в Team Fortress 2, чтобы разблокировать её.
